metadata.title: CVE-2024-57944 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iio: adc: ti-ads1298: Add NULL check in ads1298_initdevm_kasprintf() can return a NULL pointer on failure. A check on thereturn value of such a call in ads1298_init() is missing. Add it.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
